title: torch.linalg — PyTorch 2.9 documentation
text:
## torch.linalg#

Created On: Aug 07, 2020 | Last Updated On: Jun 17, 2025
Common linear algebra operations.
SeeLinear algebra (torch.linalg)for some common numerical edge-cases.

## Matrix Properties#

norm

norm
Computes a vector or matrix norm.
vector_norm

vector_norm
Computes a vector norm.
matrix_norm

matrix_norm
Computes a matrix norm.
diagonal

diagonal
Alias fortorch.diagonal()with defaultsdim1= -2,dim2= -1.
torch.diagonal()
dim1
dim2
det

det
Computes the determinant of a square matrix.
slogdet

slogdet
Computes the sign and natural logarithm of the absolute value of the determinant of a square matrix.
cond

cond
Computes the condition number of a matrix with respect to a matrix norm.
matrix_rank

matrix_rank
Computes the numerical rank of a matrix.

## Decompositions#

cholesky

cholesky
Computes the Cholesky decomposition of a complex Hermitian or real symmetric positive-definite matrix.
qr

qr
Computes the QR decomposition of a matrix.
lu

lu
Computes the LU decomposition with partial pivoting of a matrix.
lu_factor

lu_factor
Computes a compact representation of the LU factorization with partial pivoting of a matrix.
eig

eig
Computes the eigenvalue decomposition of a square matrix if it exists.
eigvals

eigvals
Computes the eigenvalues of a square matrix.
eigh

eigh
Computes the eigenvalue decomposition of a complex Hermitian or real symmetric matrix.
eigvalsh

eigvalsh
Computes the eigenvalues of a complex Hermitian or real symmetric matrix.
svd

svd
Computes the singular value decomposition (SVD) of a matrix.
svdvals

svdvals
Computes the singular values of a matrix.

## Solvers#

solve

solve
Computes the solution of a square system of linear equations with a unique solution.
solve_triangular

solve_triangular
Computes the solution of a triangular system of linear equations with a unique solution.
lu_solve

lu_solve
Computes the solution of a square system of linear equations with a unique solution given an LU decomposition.
lstsq

lstsq
Computes a solution to the least squares problem of a system of linear equations.

## Inverses#

inv

inv
Computes the inverse of a square matrix if it exists.
pinv

pinv
Computes the pseudoinverse (Moore-Penrose inverse) of a matrix.

## Matrix Functions#

matrix_exp

matrix_exp
Computes the matrix exponential of a square matrix.
matrix_power

matrix_power
Computes then-th power of a square matrix for an integern.

## Matrix Products#

cross

cross
Computes the cross product of two 3-dimensional vectors.
matmul

matmul
Alias fortorch.matmul()
torch.matmul()
vecdot

vecdot
Computes the dot product of two batches of vectors along a dimension.
multi_dot

multi_dot
Efficiently multiplies two or more matrices by reordering the multiplications so that the fewest arithmetic operations are performed.
householder_product

householder_product
Computes the firstncolumns of a product of Householder matrices.

## Tensor Operations#

tensorinv

tensorinv
Computes the multiplicative inverse oftorch.tensordot().
torch.tensordot()
tensorsolve

tensorsolve
Computes the solutionXto the systemtorch.tensordot(A, X) = B.

## Misc#

vander

vander
Generates a Vandermonde matrix.

## Experimental Functions#

cholesky_ex

cholesky_ex
Computes the Cholesky decomposition of a complex Hermitian or real symmetric positive-definite matrix.
inv_ex

inv_ex
Computes the inverse of a square matrix if it is invertible.
solve_ex

solve_ex
A version ofsolve()that does not perform error checks unlesscheck_errors= True.
solve()
check_errors
lu_factor_ex

lu_factor_ex
This is a version oflu_factor()that does not perform error checks unlesscheck_errors= True.
lu_factor()
check_errors
ldl_factor

ldl_factor
Computes a compact representation of the LDL factorization of a Hermitian or symmetric (possibly indefinite) matrix.
ldl_factor_ex

ldl_factor_ex
This is a version ofldl_factor()that does not perform error checks unlesscheck_errors= True.
ldl_factor()
check_errors
ldl_solve

ldl_solve
Computes the solution of a system of linear equations using the LDL factorization.
